Actions.Name: Container
Actions.Description: Return a container using the container ID provided

Actions.Name: Document
Actions.Description: Return a document using the document ID provided

Actions.Name: Folder
Actions.Description: Return information about a Panviva folder and references to each of its direct children

Actions.Name: Search Artefacts
Actions.Description: Return search results for a given query

Actions.Name: Live CSH
Actions.Description: Present a CSH search result page of the passing query on Panviva client to specified user on Panviva client

Actions.Name: Live Document
Actions.Description: Present a document page to specified user on Panviva client

Actions.Name: Live Search
Actions.Description: Present a search result page of the passing query on Panviva client to specified user on Panviva client

Actions.Name: Search
Actions.Description: Searches documents, folders, and files (external documents) for a term and returns paginated results

Actions.Name: Artefact
Actions.Description: Return an artefact using the ID provided

Actions.Name: Get Artefact Categories
Actions.Description: Gets a list of all available artefact categories

Actions.Name: Create Artefact Category
Actions.Description: Creates a category for classifying artefacts

Actions.Name: Document Containers
Actions.Description: Return a list of containers using the document ID provided

Actions.Name: Document Container Relationships
Actions.Description: Return a list of the parent-child relationship between each container for the document ID provided

Actions.Name: Document Translations
Actions.Description: Return a list of all translations (per language and locale) of a Panviva document

Actions.Name: File
Actions.Description: Returns a file (external document) from Panviva

Actions.Name: Folder Children
Actions.Description: Gets all the immediate children of a Panviva folder, not including grandchildren. Children can be folders, documents, or files (external documents)

Actions.Name: Folder Translations
Actions.Description: Gets all the translations of a Panviva folder, along with each translated folders respective children

Actions.Name: Folder Root
Actions.Description: Gets the root/home folder in all of Panviva, which can be drilled into using the Get Folder Children endpoint. Note this endpoint was formerly referred to as the 'Folder Search' endpoint

Actions.Name: Image
Actions.Description: Returns an image from Panviva. Image data is represented as a base64 string
